column5: Amongst the Ndamji people of Cameroon, unadorned dolls are made by blacksmiths as playthings for young girls. They are also used to mark houses when the Ndamji are at home. Once a girl reaches puberty, the dolls are beaded and dressed with shells, coins and other trinkets and then become fertility dolls, cared for as though a real child. The dolls are characterised by a narrow trunk and head, forming a striking geometric design. Each doll is unique, as variations will occur in details such as hair, waistbands and earrings.

column9: ﻿NB: Please note that this is a timber piece and as such a natural ""living"" material. It will respond to temperature and humidity variations by expanding and contracting. Your item may experience movements and cracks as it adjusts - this is not a fault, but a natural occurence within the fibres of a natural product.
column11: As with any natural material, existing fluids and moisture can leech over time, which may cause stains on some surfaces. We do not recommend placing natural timber items directly onto carpets or rugs - using a protective liner will assist.
column13: The character and appearance of knots, variety of colours and grains and cracks are inherently characteristic to the wood and not considered defects.

column5: Be the envy of all your friends with a garden that looks immaculate 365 days a year. Creating the garden you have always dreamed of at a fraction of the price in just a few hours has never been easier. Artificial vertical gardens and hedges have all the advantages of natural plants without the hassle of endless maintenance, the cost of watering and the risk of disease or dying. Made to authentically copy nature with a year round lush green look, the same natural movement and same gorgeous texture as real plants they are designed to blend seamlessly into the existing landscape. Earth friendly, UV engineered, resistant to rain and frost, guaranteed against cracking and are most importantly, easy to install, the vertical gardens and hedges are specifically designed to fit stable fences and walls made from timber, plaster, brick or metal. The perfect solution for disguising ugly walls and unsightly fences, improving privacy and transforming an ordinary outdoor space into a beautiful one.","

column5: Be the envy of all your friends with a garden that looks immaculate 365 days a year. Creating the garden you have always dreamed of at a fraction of the price in just a few hours has never been easier. Artificial vertical gardens and hedges have all the advantages of natural plants without the hassle of endless maintenance, the cost of watering and the risk of disease or dying. Made to authentically copy nature with a year round lush green look, the same natural movement and same gorgeous texture as real plants they are designed to blend seamlessly into the existing landscape. Earth friendly, UV engineered, resistant to rain and frost, guaranteed against cracking and are most importantly, easy to install, the vertical gardens and hedges are specifically designed to fit stable fences and walls made from timber, plaster, brick or metal. The perfect solution for disguising ugly walls and unsightly fences, improving privacy and transforming an ordinary outdoor space into a beautiful one.","

column5: Be the envy of all your friends with a garden that looks immaculate 365 days a year. Creating the garden you have always dreamed of at a fraction of the price in just a few hours has never been easier. Artificial vertical gardens and hedges have all the advantages of natural plants without the hassle of endless maintenance, the cost of watering and the risk of disease or dying. Made to authentically copy nature with a year round lush green look, the same natural movement and same gorgeous texture as real plants they are designed to blend seamlessly into the existing landscape. Earth friendly, UV engineered, resistant to rain and frost, guaranteed against cracking and are most importantly, easy to install, the vertical gardens and hedges are specifically designed to fit stable fences and walls made from timber, plaster, brick or metal. The perfect solution for disguising ugly walls and unsightly fences, improving privacy and transforming an ordinary outdoor space into a beautiful one.","

column1: Hamali Block Coffee Table Charred by Uniqwa Furniture,"
column5: Crafted from reclaimed teak wood found in old Javanese buildings, the Hamali Collection embraces the warmth and character of its materials. The Himali Coffee Table employs an ancient Japanese finishing technique, shou sugi ban which preserves the wood by charing it with fire giving a chemical free black finish with a coat of beeswax to enhance the characteristics of the wood. The result is a table of enduring and unique character with a contemporary profile.
